module.name: vVergence
module.description: Controlling the iCub to Verge on a Stimulus
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Controls the iCub to verge on a target

param.desc: Specifies the stem name of ports created by the module.

output.description: Outputs a debugging image displaying events from left and right cameras
